# useUpdateRoyaltySettings

Update the royalty for an NFT program

## Example

```jsx
import {
  useProgram,
  useUpdateRoyaltySettings,
} from "@thirdweb-dev/react/solana";

export default function Component() {
  const { program } = useProgram("{{program_address}}");
  const {
    mutateAsync: updateRoyalties,
    isLoading,
    error,
  } = useUpdateRoyaltySettings(program);

  return <button onClick={() => updateRoyalties(300)}>Update Royalties</button>;
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useUpdateRoyaltySettings(
  program: RequiredParam<NFTCollection | NFTDrop>,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult<
  | import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").TransactionResult[]
  | {
      signature: string;
    },
  unknown,
  UpdateRoyaltySettingsInput,
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                          | Description                                        |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| program   | [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;NFTCollection &#124; NFTDrop&gt; | The NFT program instance to update the royalty for |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult&lt;import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").TransactionResult\[\] \| { signature: string; }, unknown, UpdateRoyaltySettingsInput, unknown&gt;
